name: NetGame Adventure
description:
NetGame Adventure is a short puzzle-horror adventure game. 

Explore the 'Haunted Journey' server of a forgotten browser game.

--

Interact with the world using the 4 cursor types:

Pointer/Click | Hand/Grab | Fist/Knock | Eye/Examine

Controls:

W/S - Move Forward/Backward

A/D - Turn Left/Right

E/Q- Look Up/Down

Mouse - Control Cursor & Interact

--

NOTE: There is no gore or violence in NetGame Adventure. It is a light hearted horror game.

--
